lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The current agreement calls for an increase in high quality beef imports to 58,400 tonnes in fiscal 1987, oranges to 126,000 tonnes and orange juice to 8,500 tonnes.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. intends to press its tough stance, and Japan, as expected rejects the demands, the issue may then be put to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade for settlement, which would mean prolonging the friction beyond the April, 1988 deadline set by the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. exporters and packers beef exports to Japan under the quota system are a steady, reliable business managed by a quasi-government Japan Livestock Industry Promotion Corporation.
